00006 // Different Poincare sections
00007 // SEC1 is {y=0, p_y>0}, SEC2 is {y=0, p_y<0}
00008 typedef enum {SEC1, SEC2} section_t;    
00009 
00010 int prtbp(double mu, section_t sec, int cuts, double x[DIM], double *ti);
00011 int prtbp_inv(double mu, section_t sec, int cuts, double x[DIM], double *ti);
